summary: Completed frontend testing of Operations Dashboard UI changes. All requested features working correctly: larger map (3 cols), narrower mission timeline (1 col), fullscreen map toggle, company logo in sidebar, tab switching, and view switcher.
passed_tests: Operations Dashboard Transportation tab renders correctly with larger map (3 columns)
Mission Timeline renders correctly in narrower format (1 column)
Full Screen map button ('Ceo Ekran') works - opens fullscreen overlay
Close button ('Zatvori') on fullscreen map works - exits fullscreen mode
Company logo (Paramedic Care 018) displays correctly in dashboard sidebar
Tab switching between Transportation and Medical Care works correctly
Medical Care tab shows patient vital signs monitoring (HR, BP, SpO2, TEMP)
Admin/Operations view switcher in sidebar works correctly
Login with Super Admin credentials works
Dashboard loads with Operations view as default
critical_code_review_comments: Minor: useEffect dependency warnings in CMSManager.jsx, AuthContext.js, Dashboard.jsx - not blocking but should be addressed
Note: Patient vital signs data in Medical Care tab is MOCKED (static data in OperationsDashboard.jsx)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Operations Dashboard UI features tested and working. Map layout is 3:1 (map:timeline). Fullscreen map toggle works. Company logo displays in sidebar. Medical Care tab shows mocked patient vital signs data. Previous iteration had booking API issue (422 error) - not retested in this iteration.
mocked_data_note: Patient vital signs, active patients data, fleet availability percentage, and average response time are MOCKED in OperationsDashboard.jsx
